affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "exp_small_sound" );
	use ( "bigtank" );
	use ( "boom01" );
	use ( "boom02" );
	use ( "exp_big" );
	use ( "big_wall" );

	affect ( "end_gate1", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		play ( /*@PLAY_TYPES*/ "PLAY_ROFF", "scripts/pra4/pra4_end_gate1.rof" );
	}


	affect ( "end_gate2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		play ( /*@PLAY_TYPES*/ "PLAY_ROFF", "scripts/pra4/pra4_end_gate2.rof" );
	}

	signal ( "gates_open" );
}
